subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A.’s directors adopted a new withdrawal date from the N.B.A. draft and will toughen academic standards for football players beginning this fall.
snippet: The N.C.A.A.’s directors adopted a new withdrawal date from the N.B.A. draft and will toughen academic standards for football players beginning this fall.
